info.name: django-widgy
info.summary: Heterogeneous tree editor for Django

vulnerabilities.details: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type in Django-Widgy v0.8.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the 'image' widget in the component 'Change Widgy Page'.
